si.title: ඉරානයේ ජනාධිපති ජනාධිපති කාර්යාලයේ
body_lines: ඉස්ලාමීය ජනරජයේ සභාපති ඇතුළු ඉබ්රාහිම් රිසි හි ඉස්ලාමීය ජනරජයේ සභාපති, ටික වේලාවකට පෙර ජනාධිපති කාර්යාලයට පැමිණියේය.

en.title: Iran's president in the presidential office
body_lines: The President of the Islamic Republic of Ibrahim Risi, including the President of the Islamic Republic, arrived in the presidential office shortly before.
Subsequently, the President of Iran was resolved and honored by the Hon.. Remble

summary_lines: Ibrahim Risi, Iran's president, was honored in the presidential office by Hon. Remble.
